select m_rev_seq.nextval from dual
insert into m_rev(m_rev_no, username, m_no, rating, m_rev_content, is_spo, writing_date, genre, is_blind,like_cnt,rep_cnt) values(#{mRevNo},#{username},#{mNo},#{rating},#{mRevContent},#{isSpo}, sysdate, #{genre}, 0, #{likeCnt},#{repCnt})
mapper.select: select /*+ index_ffs(m_rev m_rev_pk_m_rev_no) */ count(m_rev_no) from m_rev

select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select /*+ index_desc(m_rev m_rev_pk_m_rev_no) */ m_rev_no mRevNo, username, m_no mNo, rating,m_rev_content mRevContent , is_spo isSpo, writing_date writingDate, genre, is_blind isBlind, like_cnt likeCnt, rep_cnt repCnt from m_rev) b where rownum<=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
select /*+ index_ffs(m_rev m_rev_pk_m_rev_no) */ count(m_rev_no) from m_rev where username = #{username}

select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select /*+ index_desc(m_rev m_rev_pk_m_rev_no) */ m_rev_no mRevNo, username, m_no mNo, rating,m_rev_content mRevContent , is_spo isSpo, writing_date writingDate, genre, is_blind isBlind, like_cnt likeCnt, rep_cnt repCnt from m_rev where username=#{username}) b where rownum<=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}

select m.m_rev_no mRevNo, m.username, m.m_no mNo, m.rating, m.m_rev_content mRevContent,is_spo isSpo , m.writing_date writingDate , m.genre, c.m_rev_cmnt_no mRevCmntNo, c.m_rev_no CmRevNo, c.username commentUsername, c.content commentContent, c.writing_date commentWritingDate from m_rev m, m_cmnt c where m.m_rev_no=#{mRevNo} and m.m_rev_no=c.m_rev_no(+)
select username from m_rev where m_rev_no=#{mRevNo} and rownum = 1
mapper.update: update m_rev set m_rev_content=#{mRevContent} where m_rev_no=#{mRevNo}
update m_rev set like_cnt = like_cnt+1 where m_rev_no = #{mRevNo}
mapper.select: select like_cnt from m_rev where m_rev_no={mRevNo}
mapper.update: update m_rev set rep_cnt = rep_cnt+1 where m_rev_no=#{mRevNo}
mapper.select: select rep_cnt from m_rev where m_rev_no=#{mRevNo}
mapper.insert: insert into m_cmnt(m_rev_cmnt_no, m_rev_no,username, content, is_blind, writing_date, cmnt_like_cnt,cmnt_rep_cnt) values(m_rev_comn_seq.nextval,#{mRevNo},#{username},#{content},#{isBlind},sysdate,#{cmntLikeCnt},#{cmntRepCnt})
mapper.select: select m_rev_cmnt_no,m_rev_no,username,content,writing_date from m_cmnt where m_rev_no=#{mRevNo} order by m_rev_cmnt_no desc
mapper.update: update m_cmnt set content=#{content} where m_rev_cmnt_no=#{mRevCmntNo}

mapper.select: select count(m_rev_cmnt_no) from m_cmnt_like where cmnt_like_no=#{cmntLikeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into m_cmnt_rep(m_rev_cmnt_no, username, title, content, writing_date, m_rep_cate) values(#{mRevCmntNo},#{username},#{title},#{content},sysdate,#{mRepCate})
